name: All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear
title: Arlecchino: All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear
in_play_description: When your Arlecchino, who has this card equipped, takes DMG: If Arlecchino has Bond of Life attached, consume 1 stack of Bond of Life and negate 1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Arlecchino to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Arlecchino, play this card on them. Attach 3 stacks of Bond of Life to Arlecchino.
When your Arlecchino, who has this card equipped, takes DMG: If Arlecchino has Bond of Life attached, consume 1 stack of Bond of Life and negate 1 DMG.
(You must have Arlecchino in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
